universal_ecom_v1.livraison: Standard delivery takes 3-5 business days (Free from $50). Express delivery takes 1-2 days ($15).
universal_ecom_v1.retours: We offer a 30-day return policy for unused items in original packaging. Returns are free.
universal_ecom_v1.paiements: We accept Visa, Mastercard, Amex, PayPal and Apple Pay.

universal_sme_v1.services: We offer consultations, repairs and maintenance services.
universal_sme_v1.tarifs: Consultations cost $50 (deducted from final invoice). Hourly rate is $80/hour.

dental_intake_v1.urgence_dentaire: For severe pain or trauma, we have same-day emergency slots between 11am-12pm and 3pm-4pm.
dental_intake_v1.assurances: We accept most insurance plans and offer payment plans.
dental_intake_v1.offre_nouveau_patient: New Patient Package at $99 includes exam, X-rays and cleaning.
dental_intake_v1.dentiste: Our dentist is a specialist in implants and cosmetic dentistry.

agency_v3.produits: VocalIA offers 3 Voice AI products: Voice Widget B2B (lead qualification), E-commerce Widget Pro (8 integrations + cart, carousel, quiz), and Voice Telephony AI (PSTN line via Twilio).
agency_v3.personas: 40 pre-configured industry personas: dentists, real estate, restaurants, e-commerce, SMEs and more.
agency_v3.langues: 5 languages supported: French, English, Spanish, Arabic and Moroccan Darija.
agency_v3.contact: Contact us via vocalia.ma/booking or email contact@vocalia.ma.
agency_v3.tarifs: 14-day free trial included. Starter €49/month, Pro €99/month, E-commerce €99/month, Telephony €199/month + €0.24/min.
agency_v3.integrations: 31+ native integrations (HubSpot, Shopify, Stripe, Calendly...) and 203 MCP tools.
agency_v3.fonctionnement: VocalIA works in 3 steps: 1) Choose your industry persona, 2) Customize your Knowledge Base, 3) Embed the widget on your site with 1 line of code. AI answers your visitors 24/7.
agency_v3.essai: Free 14-day trial on all plans, no credit card required. Book a demo at vocalia.ma/booking.
agency_v3.securite: VocalIA is designed for GDPR compliance. Data encrypted in transit (TLS 1.2+ via Traefik). JWT tenant isolation. No data shared between clients. Hosted on European VPS (Hostinger). At-rest encryption is not yet implemented.
agency_v3.support: Email support at contact@vocalia.ma with 48 business-hour response time. Full documentation at vocalia.ma/docs.
agency_v3.deploiement: Deploy in under 10 minutes: copy 1 line of JavaScript to your site. Compatible with WordPress (dedicated plugin), Shopify, and any HTML site.
agency_v3.annulation: Cancel anytime from your dashboard, no fees. Access remains active until the end of the paid period.
agency_v3.api: Full REST API documented at vocalia.ma/docs/api. Endpoints for conversations, KB, analytics, webhooks. 203 MCP tools available for advanced integration.
agency_v3.clients: VocalIA is a recently launched platform in commercial launch phase. The platform is operational with 40 industry personas and 5 languages.
agency_v3.sla: VocalIA offers best-effort service with 24/7 monitoring and automatic alerts. No contractual SLA guaranteed at this stage.
agency_v3.ia: VocalIA uses Grok (xAI) as its primary AI engine, with automatic fallback to Gemini (Google), Claude (Anthropic), and a local model. Average response time < 2 seconds.
agency_v3.wordpress: Official WordPress plugin available: install from your WP dashboard, enter your tenant ID, and the widget is active. Zero-code setup.
agency_v3.ecommerce: E-commerce Widget Pro includes: abandoned cart recovery, product quiz, spin wheel, free shipping bar, recommendation carousel. Compatible with Shopify and WooCommerce.
agency_v3.telephonie: Telephony AI module connects a PSTN line (via Twilio) to voice AI. Price: 199€/month + 0.24€/minute. AI answers, qualifies, and transfers calls.
agency_v3.multilingue: AI automatically detects visitor language and responds in the same language. RTL support for Arabic and Moroccan Darija.
agency_v3.personnalisation: Widget appearance is 100% customizable: colors (primary, accent, dark), position (bottom-right/left), logo, company name. All configured in your dashboard.
agency_v3.dashboard: Analytics dashboard included: conversation volume, conversion rate, languages used, detected intents, qualified leads. Real-time data.
agency_v3.mobile: Widget is 100% responsive and works on mobile, tablet, and desktop. Touch-optimized interface with native microphone button.
agency_v3.booking: AI can collect booking information (name, email, date, service) directly in the conversation and forward it to your team.
agency_v3.handoff: Human handoff available via webhook or notification. AI detects when visitor needs a human operator and offers transfer.
agency_v3.quotas: Each plan has monthly quotas: Starter 500 calls + 1000 sessions/month, Pro 2000 calls + 5000 sessions/month, E-commerce 2000 calls + 5000 sessions/month, Telephony 5000 calls + 10000 sessions/month.
agency_v3.donnees: Your data stays yours. Export available via API or dashboard. Stored on European VPS (Hostinger). Deletion on request. Note: data is stored as JSON, at-rest encryption is not yet implemented.
agency_v3.crm: Native CRM integration with HubSpot, Pipedrive, and Zoho. AI-qualified leads automatically pushed to your CRM with full context.
agency_v3.roi: Typical ROI: a support agent costs ~3,000-5,000€/month. VocalIA at 99€/month can replace 1-2 agents on recurring questions, saving ~3,000€/month net.
agency_v3.vocal: AI speaks with a natural voice via ElevenLabs. Visitors can use the microphone or type. Text-only mode available.
agency_v3.kb: The Knowledge Base is your source of truth. Add your FAQ, hours, pricing, procedures. AI only answers from your KB — no hallucinations.
agency_v3.darija: VocalIA is the only Voice AI platform supporting Darija (Moroccan dialect). Ideal for the Moroccan market and diaspora.
agency_v3.webhook: Webhooks available for all events: conversation started, lead qualified, booking created, payment, error. Integration with Zapier, Make, n8n.
agency_v3.shopify: Shopify installation in 2 clicks via VocalIA app. E-commerce widget auto-detects your product catalog and can recommend items.
agency_v3.facturation: Monthly billing by credit card via Stripe. Invoices available in your dashboard. VAT applied based on your country.
agency_v3.comparaison: VocalIA stands out with: 40 pre-configured industry personas, 5 languages including Darija, specialized e-commerce widget, and transparent pricing.
